column1: Note: there are more sheets in this document

column5: I was most excited for a piece I received on accident, the piece that has all of the plastic drawers in it and is of medium height.
column8: I haven't seen other classrooms yet
column10: I sit in it for various times, but collectively around 2 - 3 hours throughout the day.
column17: I would like to be able to raise the main portion of the teacher desk on my own just like the extra piece that comes with it.
column20: I have it at the front for now as I have extra pieces of furniture that was not picked up or disbursed so there is not much room for moving around yet.
column22: Mine was not assembled fully, it is missing many screws so the top is extremely unstable.,
column27: I think this is the stacking one (mine has brown wood on top), but they are light, move easy and the stacking is really nice.
column29: One set its too big and another transfers pencil very easily through paper.
column30: Nothing about the one I like best.
column32: It is lightweight, moves easy and is not loud.
column33: I would prefer to switch out one unit for another
column37: I do not like having all tall pieces. The medium height is good to be able to put stuff on top and I use it as a student station.
column38: Chromebook hookups/slots, places to hide wires, and I really like the one with all the plastic drawers
column40: I love having the new furniture. It makes the room brighter and students from last year have really noticed a difference.
column43: I would like to reevaluate the storage pieces I have and get extras out of course, but I am planning to rearrange the room before we return and will see then.

column7: The teacher desk and chair along with the rolling shelves.
column8: I haven't seen other classrooms yet
column10: About an 1 hour and a half
column17: Have the shelves connected. Maybe a long pencil pen drawer at the top
column20: It’s very bulky so I use it for the back are to teach behind students
column21: I like it , I love the large top but the bottom is bulky
column22: Space for mini drawers or basket. Smaller bottom piece to make it easier to maneuver around the room
column27: Good size , easy to move , not to bulky
column29: Some of the others are way to big and stick out on the sides
column33: I have adjusted my storage to fit
column37: I have had to squeeze it in with similar things in my class. So just feels over crowded I don’t really use the wardrobe
column40: Chaotic with all different student pieces but I really like the teacher pieces
column42: Desk were smaller and easier to rearrange . More room
column43: Steer away from bulky and heavy pieces

column5: I was most excited about the teacher podium.
column7: The rolling cabinet was exciting to see .
column8: I haven't seen other classrooms yet
column10: Maybe for a total of 3 hours
column17: I would like it to be slightly biggerz
column20: I use it most a podium and as a movable group desk
column27: They are easier to move around and not as many wheel locks
column29: So many casters means it makes it hard to actually move the desks around
column30: I would have a large desk with two wheels and two or no casters
column32: It was super light weight and moves across the floor easy
column33: All of them are working great
column37: The wardrobe lock gets stuck and loud when opening and cloaing
column38: Rack for jackets, doors that lock, shelves and drawers. Drawers of different heights.
column40: I have loved it and will be so sad when it’s gone

column5: The furniture with wheels is easy to move, and behind the chair there is a place where you can put your backpack.
column6: The furniture with wheels is easy to move, and behind the chair there is a place where you can put your backpack.
column7: You can organize your classroom in many different ways, and there is still space.
column8: I haven't seen other classrooms yet
column20: I use the teacher mobile table to move easily around the classroom while teaching. It allows me to place my laptop, lesson materials, and supplies wherever I need them, and it helps me work closely.
column22: There is nothing to add or remove
column29: All the desk has to look the same
column32: The one with the hanger behind.
column33: All of them are working great
column37: There is no complaints at all, I love it.
column40: It has more spaces than before.
column42: I do not want to see the old chairs anymore.

column5: I love the teacher desk and storage cabinets. The desks looked nice too.
column8: I haven't seen other classrooms yet
column10: 2ish hours. I sit mostly before and after school.
column17: I would like the teacher desk bigger. When you add a desktop computer to the desk, there is not a lot of space left.
column20: It is mostly fixed to one spot. However I have used it in the hall. I like that flexibility.
column29: Some desks don’t have locking wheels and they move too easily
column32: The seat is wide, it is stable, and has backpack hook.
column33: All of them are working great
column37: The shelves need to be deeper.
